## **Tolking av en regresjonstabell**

```{r}
library(gt)
library(ggplot2)
library(exscidata)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}

# Load necessary libraries (if not already loaded)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Subset the data for the relevant variables and time point
data_subset <- hypertrophy %>% filter(!is.na(SQUAT_3RM), !is.na(FAST_CSA_T1))

# Perform linear regression
regression_model <- lm(SQUAT_3RM ~ FAST_CSA_T1, data = data_subset)

# Create a regression table
regression_summary <- summary(regression_model)

# Print the regression table
print(regression_summary)

# Create a scatterplot with the regression line
ggplot(data_subset, aes(x = FAST_CSA_T1, y = SQUAT_3RM)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Muscle Cross-Sectional Area at T1", y = "Squat 3RM Strength") +
  ggtitle("Linear Regression: Muscle CSA at T1 vs. Squat 3RM Strength")


```
